name: Ricky Rocket's Shoot Em Up Showdown
name_original: Ricky Rocket's Shoot Em Up Showdown
description:
Join Ricky Rocket in his quest to destroy as many alien ships as possible in an infinite SHMUP!

Keyboard Controls: Arrow keys for movement, Space to shoot, ESC to pause.
Controller (recommended): Stick to move, Right Trigger to shoot, A to confirm, Start to pause.  

"They say everyone's first game should be a SHMUP, so I made one. It's not much, but I hope you have a bit of fun!" -Cactopolis
Background Song by [S]Alex - https://soundcloud.com/salex_rekt
